com.cyc.session.spi

Interface SessionFactory<T extends com.cyc.session.CycSession>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - - CycSession implementation
    All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CycClientSessionFactory

    public interface SessionFactory<T extends com.cyc.session.CycSession>
extends Closeable
    Responsible for creating and initializing implementations of CycSession.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T createSession(com.cyc.session.CycSessionConfiguration config)
      Creates an uninitialized CycSession instance.
      T initializeSession(T session)
      Initializes a CycSession instance.
      boolean isClosed()
      Returns whether the SessionFactory is closed.
      void releaseResourcesForServer(com.cyc.session.CycServerAddress server)
      Releases any server-related resources which a SessionFactory might be maintaining.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.io.Closeable

        close
